website_summaries.verdict: Silver, designer name 42-millimeter watch with wide band and easy-to-read analog minimalist face.
pros: Silver-tone, stainless steel case with easy-to-read, mineral sun-ray dial
Over-sized stainless steel band with fold-over clasp
cons: A few buyers didn't expect the watch to be as large as it is

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this watch. I bought it in May and already is loosing color. I barely use it!!! So mad. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Yeisel Torrens

customer_reviews.title: Authentic!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially skeptical because it was priced $100 less than the Macy's website. I was purchasing this for my sister who isn't huge into fashion so I figured even if it was a high quality knock off she wouldn't notice or even really care. Well I was pleasantly surprised when I received the watch. All signs point to it being 100% authentic! I would definitely recommend purchasing this item or others from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea G.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped it would be like. Very lovely rose tint and not too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I hoped it would be like. Very lovely rose tint and not too heavy. The face is quite large, but still not too flashy.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It is much lighter than the other ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It is much lighter than the other MK watches I own. I also had this authenticated and it is real. Great purchase at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Lori M.

customer_reviews.title: ITEM MISSING FROM BOX!!
customer_reviews.text: ITEM WAS COMPLETELY MISSING FROM BOX! Bought as a graduation gift and needed ASAP!! Very disappointed!! Need item or money back immediately!!
customer_reviews.author: mrgpropane

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this watch. Got it as a birthday present from my boyfriend. It's slim fitting but the watch face is nice and large so I can check the time with a glance. The links are easy to remove. The only thing I don't like (this is the reason I gave 4 stars) is the finish scratches off easily on the underside.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Goddard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch with a large face. I love the face is not chunky or thick like many boyfriend style watches are. I always feel like I am going to break the face when I have the chunkier style on, but this one is nice and sleek. I am completely obsessed with the rose gold. I have received many compliments on it. I have worn it everyday for almost two months now and I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Authentic! Cute!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was skeptical but I had to take the watch to a jeweler to get some links removed. Jeweler confirmed this watch is authentic and was a great deal for the price. This watch is very stylish and cute!
customer_reviews.author: ty

customer_reviews.title: Simple, yet still sleek and sophisticated!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is great. I have very small wrists, so I didn't want a watch that was too bulky and had too many parts to it. I like how it's just a simple clock, no chronograph. The gold is just right and the size of it is perfect. I made this video, so you guys can see the color and size of the watch in person. I had five links taken out. I thought it was going to be too large for my arm, but honestly it looks perfect and would work for any one!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, in great price!
customer_reviews.text: The watch cam extremely quickly in an excellent condition. I sincerely do not get the kind of comments people have about links being scratched or easily damaged. I have been non stop wearing this watch, and lets deal with it i have to be careful sometimes cause i am super clumsy and the bracelet is not made after all from indestructible material but that is the case with every object, not specific to this one!!!!!! I highly recommend this purchase! It was easy to shorten the bracelet by removing the links, and it is a classy, simple and stunning to my opinion piece of jewellery-watch!
customer_reviews.author: Chrisa

customer_reviews.title: SCRATCHED METAL
customer_reviews.text: I love love this watch, however, I just noticed that the metal on the wrist clasp is all scratched...... I just wore it for the first time today. Why would this metal scratch so easily? I am thinking about returning it. $100 for a watch and it's scratched ...... not gonna happen. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its a beautifulwatch. I purchased it as a gift after ...
customer_reviews.text: I've already reviewed this purchase once, but here it is again. Its a beautiful watch. I purchased it as a gift after seeing someone wearing this same watch. The person I gave this watch to loves it.
customer_reviews.author: R. W.

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: This product is FAKE. I bought the Runway silver- tone watch for $105 thinking it was a good price. Checked with the local jeweler to see if it was genuine- they verified it wasn't. Apparently the best way to check wether it is fake or not is to check if it has a model number at the back of the dial. Mine didn't. Prospective buyers- BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: disappointed

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift one of my agents she loved the watch and it appeared to me that it ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift one of my agents she loved the watch and it appeared to me that it was a good quality watch
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Looks great. I’m hard on watches, I don’t know how I always tend to get scratches on them. But, this was such a great price, I wear it everyday knowing I can afford a new one if/when this one starts to look to worn. It’s been months and still looks great. Watched video to take out some links and it’s still big, but just the way I like it. It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Terry loparo

customer_reviews.title: I better get my money back
customer_reviews.text: This is a trick don't buy this watch , I bought one for my wife for Christmas and on received a box with no watch ! I better get my money back !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my cousin for Xmas and I just learned that she received the gold colored watch instead of the Rose Gold!
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes when i read some comments about the watch it is very disgusting. I don't know how they use their watches cause mine i bought it Nov 11, 2015 and mine is still nice. It is a real MK with 4 numbers in the back. No regrets. Love my MK watch
customer_reviews.author: MrsEsther 💖😍💑

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Gold Tone Watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch although the band was a little too big for my tiny wrist but that issue were resolved very quickly I took the watch into the Michael kors store and had some of the links removed to adjust the band to fit my wrist and now it fits perfectly. I can't say anything negative about this watch as of now I really do love this beautiful gold tone watch most of all I love that this watch is not heavy and bulky . My reason for the four stars is because I have only had this unit for a short while. I will update if I have any issues
customer_reviews.author: Ms chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch initially, after months tarnished. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this watch and got many compliments on it initially, but after a few months the color started to tarnish and now it is unwearable because of the lack of gold color now. I am not rough with the watch I have a holder for it and only wear it to work and take it off at night. I hope the company reaches out as it is disappointing paying $100 for something and having it tarnish relatively quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Zeithamel

customer_reviews.title: Really Enjoying my new watch!
customer_reviews.text: Really Nice! I treated myself for my birthday (well no one else did!) and I'm really enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a beautiful watch-and a beautiful color!
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of a flexible metal strap, and the color is a beautiful blue. The numbers are big enough to be seen completely, accurately and sharply, and the gold color stands out beautifully, and the second hand is more accurate than most watches. It's a beautiful watch, overall. The thing that I really don't like about it, however, is the fact that the flexible metal band is way too loose, and I see no way to tighten it. I really like this beautiful watch a great deal, but I want to be able to wear it without having to push it further up my forearm. What should I do?
customer_reviews.author: mplo

customer_reviews.title: It's Authentic!
customer_reviews.text: I took this watch to a MK store and verified that it was real.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: The color
customer_reviews.text: I've had my watch for about 2 months now and I loved it! Unfortunetly the black color is fading and I don't know what to do. Soon it's going to be unwearable 😕
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: BOMB!!! FYI: if it's to big go to the MK store, they size it for free!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jean-paul

customer_reviews.title: Less than good craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Less than 2 months after the gift was opened, the gold is already chipping off the band. Really wasn't planning on dealing w/ warranty issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love it . Over all one of my favorites. Casual wear
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Michael Kors items, in the past, so have come to expect a certain standard of quality, and, in this case, it was not met. First of all, the pin was pushed in, when it arrived, so it was already running. This could cause someone to question if the item had been received already, by someone else, and then returned. The worst part of it, was that there were scuffs on the bottom links, of the watch, which caused the metal to look worn. Needless to say, this one went back, and the reorder was a watch from another company.
customer_reviews.author: tallgal

customer_reviews.title: REPLICA
customer_reviews.text: nice watch a plaine sight; but I am disappointed because it’s NOT AUTHENTIC its a full replica the material it’s cheap and for what it costs it is better to buy them authentic. - NO WARRANTY - CHEAP MATERIAL If you know about watches and you are interested in the brand, this is not the indicated. I am a fan of michael kors I have watches, wallets, handbags and I’m very upset and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Careful!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this watch for about 1 1/2 years and have wore it very infrequently, but really liked it until the stem pulled out. When placed back in, it can not be set to the proper time so the watch is worthless. Don't know if the watch was a knock off or just poorly made. Would not expect this from a MK product. I am 64 y/o woman who is not hard on her belongings, so........think carefully regarding this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cullor

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this at Macy's for $200 and it's the same thing! I paid 100 on here and it came with the two yof at warranty, something I would have had to pay extra for at Macy's. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: TOO BIG
customer_reviews.text: Face is too large. Covers my entire wrist. I am going to return it. Band is also too large, and having links removed costs $$ where I live.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, finish needs work
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful, keeps time well. Finish around clasp rubbed off first day worn just from rubbing on my desk as I typed on a keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Simply gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: The Michael Kors pink watch was purchased for me by my girlfriend as I have the Black Michael Kors watch and the Blue Michael Kors watch - I purchased the red Michael Kors watch for my girlfriend along with the silver and white tone Michael Kors watch and then we both purchased a red Michael Kors watch for my girlfriend's sister.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cimek

customer_reviews.title: Black paint comes off very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother. Beautiful watch but the black is already rubbing off less than 2 months after I began wearing it, pretty badly too. Very disappointing, especially when my $26 black watch from Charming Charlie lasted almost 2 years and this much more expensive MK one lasted less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not Image color, still wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: The watch is not nearly as pink as depicted in the picture, it is actually a gold with subtle pink undertones. However this is what I was hoping for. I'll have to get it sized as the band is much too big, but any nordstrom or macys will do that free of charge. I would do it myself, but I don't have a small enough screw driver. Overall I'm very pleased with the quality and style of this watch, I can't wait to wear it once it's sized!
customer_reviews.author: Katie HTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fittnessbabe 56
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, I have been researching the price on this watch, and found that the actual michael kors site was to expensive abd tge watch station site had it for $149 without free shipping. Love love this watch. Hoping to get it in the silver to. 42mm is the right size for my small wrist. I hafe several invicta watches but my far this is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous but seems a bit lighter than my others.
customer_reviews.text: Seems a bit light compared to my other Michael Kors watches, so I’m hoping this is truly legitimate Michael Kors and not a dup . If it’s legitimate, good price but I have paid less for other ones at TJ Max. Luv the color!
customer_reviews.author: S. Britt

customer_reviews.title: Examine that red patina
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very attractive. The first one arrived running and not fastened in the box very well. There was a tiny fleck of the red patina in the box. I returned that one and asked for a NEW one. The second one arrived in the same condition. Usually a new watch is sold with a tiny piece on the stem so it doesn't activate the watch. Not so with these. So I returned the second one and have finally received a full refund. I also purchased one directly from the Michael Kors web site with exactly the same results, but worse. I returned that one for a refund also. Not so good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Iowa Stubborn

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I just loved the watch.. It's so pretty and elegant!
customer_reviews.author: Prashant Khanal

customer_reviews.title: She LOVES it!!
customer_reviews.text: Is a beautiful watch for a great deal.. got it before the local MK store even carried it!!!! Remember to take all your MK watches to the retail stores for free sizings!!!!
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY - So I bought this watch for my daughter ‘s birthday in September, it stoped working two weeks after, I thought it was the battery so I went to get a battery change, today, because that is when I had the time, I went to this place in the mall that repairs Watches , they change the battery and it did not work, so the lady told me it was not the battery, the watch it self was defected and she could not fix it, so there I waster almost $120.00 on something that did not work. And it is too late to be return.
customer_reviews.author: SotoH

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon receipt!
customer_reviews.text: I had watched this watch for a while. I bought it, canceled the order, and bought it again the next day. So I was very disappointed to finally get it in and find it looked like this when I opened the box. Hurt my heart to have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Pretty watch
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful watch. Reason for the 4 Star rating is this is my first aluminum watch. It's so so light weight compared to my other watches. It seems to be holding up well and people notice it's color. If it continues to be this way I will upgrading to 5-Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sugarplum

customer_reviews.title: MIchael Kors has class
customer_reviews.text: I love Michael Kors products. However this watch came running. And it came with the protective plastic half off. Which makes me think that the watch was returned. However, it is an authentic MIchael Kors product and I am happy with it. I love their quality. I cannot complain about it at all.
customer_reviews.author: LWZ

customer_reviews.title: Great watch and great deal
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch and I'm so glad I got it. I gave it 4 stars because there is some rubbing on the bottom from where my wrist rests on my laptop while typing. This doesn't both me and doesn't really change the appearance of the watch unless you look close, but I know it might bother some people so I wanted to put it in there.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Took it to our Michael Kors store, ITS REAL!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. She loves it and says it’s the best watch she’s ever had. The thanks she gave me for this nice watch was worth 10X the cost for me. Will be buying more of this type of product from this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Very large watch face!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rose gold watch that is simple and a little flashy in a minimalistic kind of way. Very classy and perfect to fill bare arms during the summer when wearing tank top/short sleeves and casual dress. The face was a bit large though so I returned this model and I decided to reorder to get the mini due to it being more versatile and less flashy. It’s timeless, simple and understatedly beautiful and I am 100% satisfied with my purchase. Happy 30th birthday to me- I plan to wear it for decades.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift That Has Stood the Test "of Time" - Buying Another
customer_reviews.text: This watch has been my daughter's favorite gift of all time. You cannot beat the price for such a beautiful watch. We bought it for her 4 years ago and it has maintained it's beauty and luster. Keeps perfect time and has only needed a new battery one time. We are now purchasing one for my younger daughter and look forward to many years of enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: LarDawBreAle

customer_reviews.title: Cute watch.
customer_reviews.text: Cute watch. Came with a little chip on the band or I’d have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Somethings very wrong with these watches
customer_reviews.text: 2nd red MK watch I bought for my wife 2nd one that broke in the middle of the band and the pin came out. First time it took a couple days. This time it took under 2 months but I’ve bought her about 5 other MK watches out of the store NEVER had this problem! It took a lot less time to break then when it actually did because she wasn’t wearing it that often! You’ve been warned I wouldn’t buy MK from them! I also explained the entire situation and they told me to deal with MK about it... WoW
customer_reviews.author: Movie buff

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch!! It's striking in its simplicity and I like that it doesn't have all kinds of little other dials on the face and additional buttons. It's very sleek and looks great on!
customer_reviews.author: Susan R.

customer_reviews.title: Fake!!!!! Colour has started to fade
customer_reviews.text: An extremely beautiful watch. Have received many compliments about it. However 4 months after having purchased it the watch is constantly displaying inaccurate time. Really sisappointed!! A little over a year later the colour is fading and turning black. Therefore it can be concluded that the watch isn't genuine
customer_reviews.author: Tyra

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: WARNING - DO NOT BUY I am a collector of Michael Kors watches. Usually I buy them directly from the site but I decided to give amazon a try. I received this watch and although it says it’s authentic - IT MOST CERTAINLY IS NOT. It comes in a Michael kors box (which is a completely different color from their normal boxes) the tag on the watch says made in China and a not about Japan. Save yourself the time and money. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable and you can wear it at any time - ...
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted to write a review for a long time but I couldn't find some spare time until now. This watch took my breath away as soon as I opened the box. It exceeded all my expectations. This watch is gorgeous, very comfortable and you can wear it at any time - everyday or on special occasions. I'm in love with this watch and everyday I'm receiving a lot of compliments on it. Five of my friends already bought this watch after seeing it on my hand. i also bought the model with the blue clock face. I also love Michael Kors Watches Jaryn Three-Hand Half Bangle Watch silver and I hope I can buy it pretty soon!
customer_reviews.author: sopio

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch its not heavy and I like the gold on the face is beautiful along with the hand a numbers on the watch. I have a heavier MK watch that I paid twice the amount for and I like this slot better.
customer_reviews.author: Alesia M Featherstone

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! Took it to a local jeweler to have links taken out, and it fits great. Could have another taken out, but I'd rather have it a little lose. Looks great with dressy or causal clothes. I have had a lot of compliments on the watch. The black face with the black band make a sharp statement. I bought this for myself as a birthday treat and I am very happy with it. Package and box looked good when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. Color is brilliant. At first I felt it was to big or mannish. But after wearing it a few time I’ve come to love it. I get many compliments. Even my daughter loved it. That’s saying a lot from her.
customer_reviews.author: G. Ardoin

customer_reviews.title: Beauty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my girlfriend for Christmas as she wears a lot of red and bought it again for her sister in England - I love Michael Kors watches - I have the black one and the blue one - simply gorgeous watches.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cimek

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: This is a large watch. When I received it I thought I was sent this watch by mistake. I checked to be sure it wasn’t a mans watch. It was a woman’s but way too big for me. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I choose this daily over my pricier watches!
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my second one!! I love this watch and wear this daily- and will keep ordering this watch until it is no longer available. It is perfect to go from dressy, to business attire, to casual. When someone compliments this watch, I take it off and tell them to put it on their wrist! It is slick, has some heft, and is oddly comfortable. It ‘feels’ expensive. I have pricier watches, and still choose this one the most often. I feel naked without it, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: While the watch itself is exactly what I wanted the ...
customer_reviews.text: While the watch itself is exactly what I wanted the black plating has started to rub off after a little over a month. While I know, eventually, you have to have MK watches re-dipped having to do so after a month of wear is excessive.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch. I had to take it to have 3 links removed, but am so happy with it! This is the watch I wear while working in the clinic.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: For being a curvy gal, my wrists are super small... this watch just swallowed up my whole wrist.. the face is way too big for me. Also, I thought I would like it because it's sleek and simple, but it really just looks like a men's watch. Will be returning unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: haylizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a red watch and I love that it’s ALL red.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the style of this watch. I’ve only worn it once but it was comfortable and easy to wear. I wish it was a bit smaller though.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi4

customer_reviews.title: Warranty & Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I liked the watch, but I also was very disappointed to see that it arrived in a plastic bag, without the any of the original paperwork or warranty accompanying the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Mer

customer_reviews.title: Great shipping time and product exactly what I hoped for-not ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shipping time and product exactly what I hoped for-not too obviously branded but from a quality brand. I had 3 or 4 links taken out of the band to fit it to my wrist and now it's perfect :)
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I’m so in love with this watch. I originally bought a chocolate watch in the same design and loved it so much that I ended up getting the black one as well. I love them both so much. Great quality and looks so stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my gf for Christmas she loved it. Packaged great!!
customer_reviews.author: Lizkahlifa

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this item and seller. I originally bought a simulator watch from a different seller and I only received the box with no watch. I was skeptical to buy again but I am very happy I did I received the watch the next day
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: This watch is so on point!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect watch for me! Nice and bulky, kind of boyfriend style. It’s so flawless and you can see it from afar. Makes all my photos pop it was a reasonable price. The watch does come big but if you take it to a Michael Kors store they will remove the links for free! I had about 3 removed.
customer_reviews.author: lakesha p.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this watch I brought this watch for my girlfriend for Christmas present she loved it
customer_reviews.author: robert mills

customer_reviews.title: it is nice watch but not to much attrective
customer_reviews.text: it is nice watch but not to much attrective,Thanks again.one thing more any one buy read first review.this heavy watch i keep it my family like it.
customer_reviews.author: Khan Family

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful and exactly as pictured and it's ready to go out of the box. It has a really nice weight on your wrist without feeling heavy and it looks excellent. It was pretty large on my wrist (I have chubby wrists) but I just had a local jeweler remove two or three links and now it's a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Awful watch save your money!
customer_reviews.text: The pins holding The watch together fall out all the time And the watch is larger than I thought. Looks good on picture but nothing like you get delivered!
customer_reviews.author: Asmir Vehabovic

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch, very heavy
customer_reviews.text: I am a watch freak. Have many MK, this however is very heavy. Back it went
customer_reviews.author: Skyelan Rose

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love my watch i purchased this two years ago and it works perfectly like the day i got it few scratch but it’s normal i wear it every day good price
customer_reviews.author: Anna Sposito

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous watch.
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous watch. It arrived in perfect condition. However, the band was much wider than I expected. It almost looks like a man's watch. So I decided to return it. But if you like a wider band, you will love this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pratt

customer_reviews.title: LARGE FACE
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this watch online and when I saw it in person. However, I feel the face of the watch is much too large for my wrist. I have ordered another watch from a different manufacturer and will compare upon receipt. It is a shame because other than the face size I would like to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: This watch is way too big to be for a woman. My daughter has average size wrists and this watch is too big for her. Probably needs 3 links taken out.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great price/beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Color is wonderful!! This is my third Michael Kors watch and I wasn’t disappointed. Pricing made this purchase an excellent deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: te

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, but not flashy
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, but not flashy. Looks good if you’re dressing up or just casual. I also have this style in silver and I have a black with gold numbers. You can have them adjusted at a Michael Kors store for no charge if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dee B

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great accent to Any outfit
customer_reviews.text: Very classic and chic, yet versatile. Makes a great accent to Any outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Leong

customer_reviews.title: It’s  a lovely MK watch
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful watch , I have one and I bought one for my friend too and still hoping to get another one for another friend . I’m so in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: getitrightthefirsttime

customer_reviews.title: Awesome red
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this watch but I decided to return it since I realized I probably wouldn’t use it as much as I thought. It’s a great design.
customer_reviews.author: Rapunzliam

customer_reviews.title: Much pretty in person love love love would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one that I've ordered . Jus got this for my daughter for her birthday, I'm pretty sure she's going to love it! Bought one for myself very pretty in person . Love Love Love Glad I made the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch come before I knew it
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch come before I knew it.. just as I saw on website an beautiful jewelry . Had to take out one link because I wanted a close fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous watch.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful. My husband gave it to me as an anniversary gift and I’m am so happy with it. It’s exactly what I wanted in a new watch.
customer_reviews.author: Ben & Leslie Kell

customer_reviews.title: face is as widw as my wrist.
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL watch face is extremely large. A smaller face would of gotten 5 stars. I must return. the watch.
customer_reviews.author: N. Lee

customer_reviews.title: It's just PERFECT. The digits are very clear and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this watch from another website last year and used it every single day but then it got lost and I bought it again from Amazon. It's just PERFECT. The digits are very clear and easy to read but not annoying numbers. It looks professional and feminine and the same time. It's not small cute watch if you are looking for something like that.
customer_reviews.author: Nuha

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I loved the gold and rose gold color, it goes well with other rose gold jewelry that I wear. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Toyabme

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a watch before and I absolutely love this one!! I am glad I bought it for my first watch it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: janessa Mione

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice watch. I bought it for my sister and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice watch. I bought it for my sister and she loves it. It is not thick, and it has a very nice dial. She resized the watch easily. For you ladies out there the MK3221 is a nice watch to start your collection.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color
customer_reviews.text: The watch is very nice with a beautiful color. I gave it as a gift and she hasn’t taken it off yet
customer_reviews.author: Energy Guy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite watches. It's slim, simple and exactly what I was looking for. The face is big which I like and I can wear it with just about anything. I love it so much I'll likely buy the silver version as well. I can't say enough good things about it and get a lot of compliments when I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: mandys8221

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT♥️
customer_reviews.text: Watch is BEAUTIFUL. No scratches. Came in the MK box with protective plastic covering. Also came with care instructions but no warranty. All in all EVERYTHING that I expected. ♥️
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I got this in Black and gold 2 years ago and it's held up amazing. When my silver cheap watch stopped working I knew I needed the same watch in silver. Excited to wear it regularly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the matte in the middle
customer_reviews.text: This watch is perfect. It's just the right size with just enough gold. The center part of the band is a more Matte gold and it really add that perfect finishing touch
customer_reviews.author: ChicChicago

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a birthday gift to myself! Quality product that arrived in the signature Michael Kors box with plastic wrapping on the face and band. The watch is oversized and may need a link or two taken out for a more snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: Classydiva

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very comfortable and the color is lovely and great quality
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

product_meta.title: Michael Kors Slim Runway Three-Hand Watch
product_meta.description:
* Watch Sizing Guide
 * Emphasize the magnificence of your look with the subtle luxury of this Michael Kors™ timepiece.
 * Gold-tone stainless steel case and bracelet.
 * Fold-over clasp closure with push-button release.
 * Three-hand analog display with quartz movement.
 * Dial includes brand name logo and hour markers.
 * Polished top ring.
 * Water resistant 5 ATM/50 meters.
 * Measurements:  *  Case Height: 42 mm
    *  Case Width: 42 mm
    *  Case Depth: 8 mm
